input.sentences: the reporters gathered around the ferry as they waited to board .
on the other ferry the radio broadcasters were exciting another ferry .
they were all happy to attend the media event .

output.sentences: The fog and reporters have both gathered on the docks.
Sports fans and stars alike begin their ferry ride, amidst radio interviews.
Baseball icons wave to passersby and fans.
The ferry pulls out of the dock slowly, even still almost managing to tip some members of the crowd overboard.
As they cross the river, fans have found other boats to join them, and show their support.
